Wolfblade:

She grinned and chuckled. "Sure. Why not?"  She went towards the door 
to the mess hall. She turned her head and glanced at Blackfang. She 
hadn't seen another wolfbot in forever. She remembered her old pack.  
An elite fighting team. She returned her thoughts to the project at 
hand.  "Uh, so what's the topic we need to discuss? Other than how 
you like your energon mixed?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> 
> robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:Malice let a rarely seen 
smile crep across his face.
> "Now thats out of the way, let's eat something before we get 
dragged into something.  I also want your help with pulling my plan 
off.  I want to speak to you in private about it later."
> He motioned for her to lead the way to the mess hall.
> 
> raccoon7679 <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She smiled at Malice. "Sure. I understand. We all let our emotion 
> chips get the better of us sometimes. No hard feelings pal. Friends 
> it is. Glad to have a fighter like you on our side." She shook his 
> paw with a friendly smile on her face plates. 
> 
>

> wrote:
> > Malice found a computer terminal and began accessing it. He 
pulled

> He

conduits

> free 
> > time, so he felt it would time to apologize to Wolfblade.
> > "Hey Wolfblade? I want to say I'm sorry for earlier. I was 
> hungrey

> > He extended his clawed hand, to shake and make up.
